to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book

sentences.english: Zhaiqiao has had a chequered history with elections.
sentences.chinese: 寨橋村的選舉有過一波三折的歷史。

sentences.english: Works bizarre plot twists and turns, twists and turns, exciting.
sentences.chinese: 作品情節曲折離奇，一波三折，扣人心絃。

sentences.english: Foreign private-equity firms have a history of running into trouble in China.
sentences.chinese: 資私募股權投資公司在中國的投資之路可謂一波三折。

sentences.english: After ten stormy years, the relationship broke up.
sentences.chinese: 他們的關係一波三折，過了十年就終止了。
